title: Whats this?
content: React Tree is a recursive tree component for call scripting, knowledge base or whatever you want! I used the react-tutorial repo as a base for this project

title: What are the features?
content: There are a range of features, check them out

title: References
content: You can place a reference on any panel for lightweight tracking of call script used/knowledge base question asked.

title: How do I use it?
content: Require tree.js and then render the react component wherever needed. The only parameter required is **url** which should return [appropriately formatted](data.json) json

title: Why?
content: I required a simple recursive tree for a work project and was suprised this didn't already exist, so I created it
